Package edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.regionalization

Class PRUC

java.lang.Object
edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.regionalization.PRUC
All Implemented Interfaces:
RegionalizationMethod
public class PRUC extends Object implements RegionalizationMethod
The PRUC problem is a generalized version for the p-regions problem

    • execute_regionalization

      public Object[] execute_regionalization(Map<Integer,Set<Integer>> neighborSet, ArrayList<Long> disAttr, ArrayList<Long> sumAttr, ArrayList<Double> centroids_x, ArrayList<Double> centroids_y, long threshold, int p) throws InterruptedException, CloneNotSupportedException
      Execute the regionalization
      Parameters:
      neighborSet - the neighborhood relationship of the areas
      disAttr - the list of similarity attribtues
      sumAttr - the list of extensive attributes
      centroids_x - the list of centroids latitudes of the areas
      centroids_y - the list of centroids longitudes of the areas
      threshold - the threshold on the constraint
      p - the predefined number of regions
      Returns:
      the heterogeneity and labels of the partition and areas if a feasible partition is found or null if a feasible partition is not found
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - multi-threading environment
      CloneNotSupportedException - cloneing the set of areas

    • execute_regionalization

      public void execute_regionalization(Map<Integer,Set<Integer>> neighborSet, ArrayList<Long> disAttr, ArrayList<Long> sumAttr, Long threshold)
      Description copied from interface: RegionalizationMethod
      This method formulates the execute_regionalization method for the regionalization algorithms.
      Specified by:
      execute_regionalization in interface RegionalizationMethod
      Parameters:
      neighborSet - A hashmap. The key is the index of each area. The value is the set of indices of the neighbor areas of the given area. The area index is assumed to be 0 to the number of areas that correspond to the attribute lists.
      disAttr - The list of dissimilarity attributes
      sumAttr - The list of attributes for the summation constraint.
      threshold - The lower-bound threshold for the sum constraint
